title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc by selecting it from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view.
